item.title: Complete Hugo Blog Posting Guide - Tips from Real Experience
item.description: Based on the trial and error I experienced while running a Hugo blog, I’ll share efficient posting methods and useful tips. This will be especially helpful if you’re using it with GitHub Pages.

item.title: React Functional Components and Hooks Guide
item.description: React Hooks, introduced in React 16.8, enable state management and lifecycle features in functional components. Let’s explore the essential Hooks and their usage.
